name: Tailspin!
description:
Play as a treasure seeking canary and drill through 4 unique worlds of action packed platforming. Can you survive the infested depths below and attain everlasting glory?

Features:

  • 20+ Levels of acrobatic platforming
  • A large variety of stage hazards
  • 2 unique endings
  • Multiple achievements to unlock
  • An original soundtrack
  • High quality pixel art graphics

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space / Z - Jump
  • Shift / X - Drill
  • Esc - Pause

Contributors:

  • sarn - Programming
  • Oroshibu - Programming
  • THX - Art
  • SnakeBlock - Art
  • attfooy - Art
  • Shrombus - Art
  • Bubonto - Concept Art
  • squp - Additional Level Design
  • Mista Jub - Sound and Music

Level and game design by everyone involved.

The OST can be found here.

Tailspin! is an action platformer game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 48, with the theme "Deeper and Deeper".
